title: How to Make Live Wallpaper

methods.name: Adding a Live Wallpaper to your iPhone

steps.headline: Open the Settings app.
steps.description: This app is grey and has a picture of a gear on it. All iPhones come preloaded with the Settings app.

steps.headline: Select the Wallpaper icon.
steps.description: Scroll down the Settings menu until you see the Wallpaper icon. Tap on the Wallpaper icon to open the Wallpaper settings. The Wallpaper option button has a blue flower icon beside it.

steps.headline: Press the “Choose a New Wallpaper” option.
steps.description: The new Wallpaper option is located at the top of the screen. This will give you the option to open your gallery.

steps.headline: Tap the Camera Roll button.
steps.description: Locate this button at the bottom of the screen. This allows you to view your Live photos.

steps.headline: Select the Live photo that you want to use.
steps.description: Scroll through your photos to find the Live photo that you want to be your background. If you don't have your own Live photo, select one of the iPhone Live wallpapers instead. Press your finger on the photo for 2 seconds to preview the animation.

steps.headline: Tap the “Set” button.
steps.description: This places the Live photo on your screen to allow you to preview the image. If you decide you don't like the photo, simply tap cancel and then select a different photo.

steps.headline: Select the Home screen, Lock screen, or both option.
steps.description: If you want the Live photo on your screen when you turn your phone on, select the Lock screen option. If you want the Live photo to show underneath your apps, select the Home screen option. If you'd like to use the same Live photo for both the Home screen and Lock screen, select both.

methods.name: Selecting a Live Wallpaper on your Android

steps.headline: Open the Google Play Store.
steps.description: This app has a multicoloured triangle icon and is automatically installed on all Android phones. Tap the Google Play Store icon to open the store.

steps.headline: Install a Live wallpaper app.
steps.description: Tap the magnifying glass at the top of the Google Play Store app to open the search bar. Type in “Live wallpaper” and then press search. Tap on your favourite app and press install. Look for an app with lots of good reviews, as this shows that other people enjoyed using the app. There are plenty of good free apps. Try Forest Live Wallpaper, Giraffe Playground, or Joko Interactive.

steps.headline: Open the app and press the gallery option.
steps.description: Press the back arrow to exit the Google Play Store app and then tap on your new Live wallpaper app. Select the gallery option to show you the Live photos that can be used as your wallpaper.

steps.headline: Select the Live photo or GIF you want to use as your wallpaper.
steps.description: Scroll through the different GIF's and Live photos until you find one that you like. Tap on the image that you like to select it. Hold down a photo that you like to preview its animation.

steps.headline: Tap the green check mark to install the wallpaper.
steps.description: The app will either have a green check mark or a “set Home screen” button. Tap the relevant button and then enjoy your new wallpaper. A check mark is called a tick in some countries.
